content:
Hey Jesse — what do you want to knock out right now?

A few fast options:
- quick daily check-in (what changed since yesterday, top 1–3 today, blockers)
- debugging session (paste logs / describe expected vs actual)
- pick a single priority and I’ll turn it into a tight next-actions plan
when did I last talk with MattF

data.body:
## Summary
MattF is referenced as an inspiration source for agentic media tooling via "Prologue CAD".

## Relevance
- Mentioned in the context of **agentic imagery** exploration as an analogous pattern for CAD: generate variations, enable rapid human evaluation, and use genetic algorithms to drive creativity.

## Source pointer
- Referenced note: `meetings/2026-01-24-mattf-prologue-cad.md` (not included in this ingestion).


## Background
- Friend of JJ from **Planet**.
- JJ is invested in MattF’s startup **Feather**.
- Website: https://mattferraro.dev/

## Work discussed (2026-01-24)
- Building **Prologue CAD**, an AI-powered CAD exploration tool emphasizing rapid forking of design ideas and fast human evaluation.

front_matter.summary: MattF, JJ’s Planet friend/investment, inspired agentic imagery tooling via Prologue CAD: rapid variant generation, human eval, genetic creativity.
front_matter.title: MattF

content:

If you meant “last time including iMessage/calls/etc”, I don’t have that unless it was ingested into the vault.
